Hi there,
I'm trying to write a program which will use Heritrix to crawl fo=
r semantic web documents, but I'm having difficulty understanding what need=
s to be done to properly run a crawl from Eclipse. I've downloaded and impo=
rted all the necessary files, and have declared an instance of Heritrix, an=
d my best guess is that before you can run a crawl you have to pass it all =
the arguments that are passed to it when you run Heritrix through the web U=
I. Could anyone tell me what exactly you need to do before it will run a cr=
awl and start returning pages? 
Unless I've totally misunderstood what need=
s to be done..

Any help would be much appreciated.
